meanings.definition: A small rounded mass or lump.
meanings.sent1: The doctor found a nodule in my lung during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: She felt a nodule on the surface of the peach.
meanings.sent3: The nodule on the tree looked like a tiny green apple.
meanings.sent4: The nodule of clay in the soil held the plant firmly in place.
meanings.sent5: The nodule on the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The computer technician pointed to a nodule on the circuit board.
meanings.sent2: The nodule on the bracelet added an interesting texture.
meanings.sent3: The nodule on the sweater made it look like a bumpy road.
meanings.sent4: The nodule on the doorknob made it difficult to turn.
meanings.sent5: The nodule on the tree branch resembled a tiny bump.
